articles.author: Alex Daniel
articles.title: Scientists find 'giant' dinosaur spider fossil in Australia - indy100
articles.description: If you thought Australia’s spiders were scary, wait until you see the prehistoric version.Scientists have found a fossilised giant trapdoor spider in New South Wales, only the fourth specimen of its kind to be found in Australia.The creature would have roamed…
articles.content:
If you thought Australias spiders were scary, wait until you see the prehistoric version.

articles.title: Fossil Of Giant Prehistoric Spider Found In Australia - NDTV
articles.description: The fossil is about 16 million years old. Scientists have named it Megamonodontium mccluskyi.
articles.content:
The spider was found among many other Miocene-era fossils.
We all try to avoid things that make us feel uncomfortable. And spiders are right on top in this list. But latest discovery in Australia is… [+1415 chars]
